title: Adani Infrastructure India appoints Bimal Dayal as CEO
description: Bimal Dayal, CEO of Adani Energy Solutions Ltd, has been appointed as the new CEO of Adani Infrastructure India Limited. Dayal will oversee the implementation of infrastructure projects in thermal, renewable energy, and green hydrogen. The current management team, led by Anil Sardana and Kandarp Patel, will drive growth in Transmission, Distribution, and smart meter segments.
